text:
大人しい
メイドでいろ
僕の話を聞け!
style: font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 18.56%;top: 15.24%;width: 8.72%;height: 10.61%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
降りて
小さな
ご主人様
style: font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 43.24%;top: 13.17%;width: 7.77%;height: 10.00%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 65.27%;top: 18.05%;width: 7.02%;height: 6.22%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
毎回、逃げ
おおせると
思うなよ!
style: font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 32.50%;top: 48.90%;width: 8.09%;height: 11.22%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
君に
あるのは
逃げ足だけ、
僕は何でも
持ってる!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 43.78%;top: 32.80%;width: 11.06%;height: 16.22%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
僕の話を
聞いてりゃ
いい!
